changeSet.author: mderamos

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM phenotype phenotype_duplicate INNER JOIN phenotype phenotype WHERE phenotype.phenotype_id > phenotype_duplicate.phenotype_id AND phenotype_duplicate.observable_id = phenotype.observable_id AND phenotype_duplicate.nd_experiment_id = phenotype.nd_experiment_id;

changeSet.sql: DELETE phenotype_duplicate FROM phenotype phenotype_duplicate INNER JOIN phenotype phenotype WHERE phenotype.phenotype_id > phenotype_duplicate.phenotype_id AND phenotype_duplicate.observable_id = phenotype.observable_id AND phenotype_duplicate.nd_experiment_id = phenotype.nd_experiment_id;
